actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for State and local general sales taxes and to compensate for the resulting revenue loss by providing that only 75 percent of the amount of all State and local taxes shall be allowed as a deduction.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an itemized deduction for 75 percent of State and local general sales taxes.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for State and local general sales taxes and to compensate for the resulting revenue loss by providing that only 75 percent of the amount of all State and local taxes shall be allowed as a deduction.
